segments.text: Excuse me , is this the Auto Consumer Loan Center ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you tell me something about the terms and interest rates for personal automobile consumer loan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The deadline is normally no more than 5 years with the interest adopted according to the corresponding lending rates announced by the PBC .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I plan to take the loan for 3 years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the yearly interest rate is 5.49 % for 3 years . I'm sure you are qualified to apply for this loan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You may choose a repayment pattern by consulting with our bank , for example , payment of equal amount of principal or of principal and interest on monthly installments .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does that mean I should deposit sufficient money to my account prior to the monthly payment date so that you can directly deduct the repayment of the principal and interest ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Exactly . You are permitted to effect and early payment in part or in full with the consent of our bank .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's very thoughtful of you . Thank you so much .
segments.speaker: S1
